EmailTemplate.name: APJ_Event_SG_Big Data Roadshow_Q117.Confirmation - Singapore
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for registering for the Pivotal Big Data Roadshow in Singapore. Please see event details below.
Date & Time: Thursday, 23 February 2017, 8.30am - 3.00pm Location: NUSS Suntec City Guild House, 3 Temasek Boulevard (Tower 5), #02- 401/402 Suntec City Mall, Singapore 038983
{{my.Save the Date Singapore}}
Questions? Please email Jade Tan <[[mailto:jtan@pivotal.io]]>.
